sources.full: ## More Variable Traits for Custom Lineage from Tasha's

table.name: Variable Traits for Custom Lineage
table.caption: This Table is intended to be used with {@race Custom Lineage|tce} from {@i Tasha's Cauldron of Everything}. You may choose or roll a d20 for one of the following Traits for your Custom Lineage from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything.
rows: Darkvision 60ft.
Proficiency one skill.
5ft Fly speed.
Climbing speed equal to your Walking speed.
Swimming speed equal to your Walking speed.
5ft Burrow speed. It leaves behind a usable tunnel about 5 feet in diameter.
+10ft Walking speed.
Unarmored AC is 12+DEX or CON Modifier.
One Cantrip of any class, using spellcasting ability of that class.
+1 AC independent of armor or shield.
One Tool or Weapon Proficiency of your choice.
Gain the Trait 'Powerful Build' or 'Fury of the Small'.
Creature type Fey rather than Humanoid.
Proficiency in either Light, Medium or Heavy armor.
Resistance to Poison.
Resistance to Cold.
Resistance to Fire.
One ability score of your choice increases by 1 (Up to 18).
Claw Attack (1d4+STR Slashing).
Increase or Reduce your Size by one category.
